| 5 |  | #P_muladd | |- ( ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) /\ ( C e. CC /\ D e. CC ) ) -> ( ( A + B ) x. ( C + D ) ) = ( ( ( A x. C ) + ( D x. B ) ) + ( ( A x. D ) + ( C x. B ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_mp4an | |- ( ( A + B ) x. ( C + D ) ) = ( ( ( A x. C ) + ( D x. B ) ) + ( ( A x. D ) + ( C x. B ) ) ) |
